Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam.Motives: Creation of an independent state of Tamil Eelam in the north and east of Sri Lanka.
Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam.Ideology: Tamil nationalism | Separatism | Revolutionary socialism | Secularism
Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam.Major actions: Sri Lankan Civil War, | List of Attacks
Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam.Annual revenue: US$200-300 million prior to the military defeat.
Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam.Means of revenue: Donations from expatriate Tamils, extortion, drug trafficking, shipping, sales of weapons and taxation under LTTE-controlled areas. | [ | citation needed | ]
